TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFormatProvider

summary.span: 提供用于检索控制格式化的对象的机制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for retrieving an object to control formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供一个对象, 该对象提供格式设置信息以进行格式设置和分析操作。The interface supplies an object that provides formatting information for formatting and parsing operations. 格式设置操作将类型的值转换为该值的字符串表示形式。Formatting operations convert the value of a type to the string representation of that value. 典型的格式设置方法`ToString`是类型的方法, 以及。Typical formatting methods are the `ToString` methods of a type, as well as . 分析操作将值的字符串表示形式转换为具有该值的类型。Parsing operations convert the string representation of a value to a type with that value. 典型的分析方法`Parse`是`TryParse`和。Typical parsing methods are `Parse` and `TryParse`. 接口由单一方法组成。 The interface consists of a single method, . 是回调方法:分析或格式设置方法会调用它, 并向其传递一个对象, 该对象表示格式设置或分析方法期望的对象类型将提供格式设置信息。 is a callback method: The parsing or formatting method calls it and passes it a object that represents the type of object that the formatting or parsing method expects will provide formatting information. 方法负责返回该类型的对象。The method is responsible for returning an object of that type. 实现通常通过格式设置和分析方法隐式使用。 implementations are often used implicitly by formatting and parsing methods. 例如, 方法隐式使用表示系统当前区域性的实现。For example, the method implicitly uses an implementation that represents the system's current culture. 还可以通过具有类型的参数的方法 ( 如和) 显式指定实现。 implementations can also be specified explicitly by methods that have a parameter of type , such as and . .NET Framework 包含以下三个预定义的实现, 以提供用于对数字和日期和时间值进行格式设置或分析的区域性特定信息:The .NET Framework includes the following three predefined implementations to provide culture-specific information that is used in formatting or parsing numeric and date and time values: - 类, 它提供用于设置数字格式的信息, 如货币、千位分隔符和特定区域性的小数分隔符符号。The class, which provides information that is used to format numbers, such as the currency, thousands separator, and decimal separator symbols for a particular culture. 有关由对象识别并在数字格式设置操作中使用的预定义格式字符串的信息, 请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For information about the predefined format strings recognized by a object and used in numeric formatting operations, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 类, 它提供用于设置日期和时间格式的信息, 如特定区域性的日期和时间分隔符符号, 或者日期的年、月和日部分的顺序和格式。The class, which provides information that is used to format dates and times, such as the date and time separator symbols for a particular culture or the order and format of a date's year, month, and day components. 有关由对象识别并在数字格式设置操作中使用的预定义格式字符串的信息, 请参阅[标准日期和时间格式](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)字符串和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For information about the predefined format strings recognized by a object and used in numeric formatting operations, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 表示特定区域性的类。The class, which represents a particular culture. 其方法返回特定于区域性的或对象, 具体取决于是否在涉及数字或日期和时间的格式设置或分析操作中使用对象。Its method returns a culture-specific or object, depending on whether the object is used in a formatting or parsing operation that involves numbers or dates and times. .NET Framework 还支持自定义格式设置。The .NET Framework also supports custom formatting. 这通常涉及创建实现和的格式设置类。This typically involves the creation of a formatting class that implements both and . 然后, 将此类的一个实例作为参数传递给执行自定义格式设置操作的方法, 如示例所示, 此类自定义实现将数字的格式设置为12位数帐号。An instance of this class is then passed as a parameter to a method that performs a custom formatting operation, such as The example provides an illustration of such a custom implementation that formats a number as a 12-digit account number. ## Examples 下面的示例阐释了实现如何更改日期和时间值的表示形式。The following example illustrates how an implementation can change the representation of a date and time value. 在这种情况下, 将使用表示四个不同区域性的对象来显示单个日期。In this case, a single date is displayed by using objects that represent four different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/provider2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/provider2.vb#3)] 下面的示例演示如何使用实现接口的类和方法。The following example illustrates the use of a class that implements the interface and the method. 类将表示帐号的值转换为格式化的12位数帐号。`AcctNumberFormat` The `AcctNumberFormat` class converts an value that represents an account number to a formatted 12-digit account number. 如果`GetFormat` `GetFormat` `null`参数引用了实现`AcctNumberFormat` 的类,则其方法返回对当前实例的引用;否则返回。 `formatType`Its `GetFormat` method returns a reference to the current `AcctNumberFormat` instance if the `formatType` parameter refers to a class that implements ; otherwise, `GetFormat` returns `null`. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#2)] 然后, 实现的类可用于调用格式设置和分析操作。The class that implements can then be used in a call to a formatting and parsing operation. 例如, 下面的代码调用方法以生成一个字符串, 该字符串包含带格式的12位帐户号。For example, the following code calls the method to generate a string that contains a formatted 12-digit account number. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#1)]

related.span: 设置 .NET 中类型的格式
如何：定义和使用自定义数值格式提供程序

span.span: How to: Define and Use Custom Numeric Format Providers

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetFormat(class System.Type formatType) cil managed
Public Function GetFormat (formatType As Type) As Object

param.name: formatType
param.span: 一个对象，该对象指定要返回的格式对象的类型。

span.span: An object that specifies the type of format object to return.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象为指定类型提供格式设置服务。

span.span: Returns an object that provides formatting services for the specified type.

returns.span: 如果 实现能够提供该类型的对象，则为 所指定对象的实例；否则为 。

span.span: An instance of the object specified by , if the implementation can supply that type of object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是格式设置和分析方法调用的回调方法, 用于检索有关分析操作中输入字符串格式的信息, 或格式设置操作中的输出字符串的格式。 is a callback method that formatting and parsing methods invoke to retrieve information about the format of the input string in parsing operations or the format of the output string in formatting operations. `formatType`在参数中, 格式设置或分析方法传递执行其操作所需的对象的类型。In the `formatType` parameter, the formatting or parsing method passes the type of object it requires to perform its operation. 如果实现可以提供此格式设置或分析对象, 则会返回该对象。If the implementation can supply this formatting or parsing object, it returns that object. 如果不是, 则`null`返回。If not, it returns `null`. 例如, 在调用方法时, 方法自变量是一个对象, 该对象提供有关当前整数实例的字符串表示形式如何进行格式化的信息。For example, in the call to the method, the method argument is an object that provides information about how the string representation of the current integer instance might be formatted. 当运行时执行方法时, 它将调用对象的方法, 并向其传递一个表示类型的对象。When the runtime executes the method, it calls the object's method and passes it a object that represents the type. 如果对象可以提供对象, 则返回该对象。 If the object can supply a object, it returns that object. 如果无法提供该类型的对象, 它将返回`null`。If it cannot supply an object of that type, it returns `null`. 可以在提供自定义格式设置或分析服务的类中实现接口和方法。You can implement the interface and the method in classes that provide custom formatting or parsing services. 然后 , 将实现作为参数传递给具有类型为的参数的分析或格式设置方法的任何重载, 如、 或。The implementation is then passed as an argument to any overload of a parsing or formatting method that has a parameter of type , such as , , or . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用实现接口的类和方法。The following example illustrates the use of a class that implements the interface and the method. 类将表示帐号的值转换为格式化的12位数帐号。`AcctNumberFormat` The `AcctNumberFormat` class converts an value that represents an account number to a formatted 12-digit account number. `GetFormat` `GetFormat`如果参数引用了实现的类, 则其方法返回对自身的引用; 否则返回`null`。 `formatType`Its `GetFormat` method returns a reference to itself if the `formatType` parameter refers to a class that implements ; otherwise, `GetFormat` returns `null`. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#2)] 然后, `AcctNumberFormat`可以将类的实例作为参数传递给提供格式设置或分析服务的方法。An instance of the `AcctNumberFormat` class can then be passed as an argument to a method that provides formatting or parsing services. 例如, 下面的代码将`AcctNumberFormat`类传递给方法, 以生成带格式的12位数帐号。For example, the following code passes an `AcctNumberFormat` class to the method to generate a formatted 12-digit account number. [!code-csharp[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/cs/Provider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IFormatProvider.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IFormatProvider.Class/vb/Provider.vb#1)]
